Name: ARMORED HEAD
About the game: ARMORED HEAD is a miniature shooter, where all the action takes place in one arena. The main character is a gladiator who fights against his opponents in pursuit of the grand prize. His task is to defeat 30 waves of opponents, unravel all the secrets of the arena, and win the gold cup . The character will be collecting gold coins, which will help him unlock some useful features of the arena, and become the winner in the battles.
Meta Title: ARMORED HEAD: Jul 31, 2020, Egor Rezenov and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on ARMORED HEAD? Check out the release date (Jul 31, 2020), developer insights from Egor Rezenov, and a complete game summary.
